mapper.sql: RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_NAME, SUBJECT_ID, AUTHOR, THUMB_PATH, VIEW_CNT, SOURCE_TYPE, STORE_PATH, LIVING_PATH, LIVING_FLAG, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select: SELECT res.RESOURCE_ID resourceId,res.RESOURCE_NAME resourceName,res.AUTHOR author,sub.SUBJECT_NAME subjectName, GROUP_CONCAT(cl.CLASSLEVEL_NAME ORDER BY cl.SORT ASC SEPARATOR '/') classlevelName FROM resource res LEFT JOIN subject sub ON res.SUBJECT_ID = sub.SUBJECT_ID JOIN resource_r_classlevel rrc ON res.RESOURCE_ID=rrc.RESOURCE_ID JOIN classlevel cl ON rrc.CLASSLEVEL_ID=cl.CLASSLEVEL_ID WHERE res.LIVING_FLAG = 'Y' AND res.DELETE_FLAG='N' AND res.SOURCE_TYPE = 'RECORD' AND res.LIVING_PATH IS NOT NULL AND res.LIVING_PATH !='' GROUP BY res.RESOURCE_ID ORDER BY res.CREATE_TIME DESC

select res.RESOURCE_ID resourceId,res.RESOURCE_NAME resourceName,res.AUTHOR author, res.THUMB_PATH thumbPath,res.VIEW_CNT viewCnt,sub.SUBJECT_NAME subjectName,u.REALNAME creatName, GROUP_CONCAT(cl.CLASSLEVEL_NAME ORDER BY cl.SORT ASC SEPARATOR '/') classlevelName from resource res left join user u on res.CREATE_USER_ID = u.USER_ID left join subject sub on res.SUBJECT_ID = sub.SUBJECT_ID JOIN resource_r_classlevel rrc ON res.RESOURCE_ID=rrc.RESOURCE_ID JOIN classlevel cl ON rrc.CLASSLEVEL_ID=cl.CLASSLEVEL_ID where res.LIVING_FLAG = 'N' and res.DELETE_FLAG='N'
and res.RESOURCE_ID in (select rrcl.RESOURCE_ID from resource_r_classlevel rrcl,classlevel cll where rrcl.CLASSLEVEL_ID=cll.CLASSLEVEL_ID and cll.CLASSLEVEL_NAME = #{map.classlevelName})
and res.SUBJECT_ID in (SELECT sj.SUBJECT_ID FROM subject sj WHERE sj.SUBJECT_NAME = #{map.subjectName})
and res.SOURCE_TYPE=#{map.sourceType}
and res.RESOURCE_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{map.resourceNameKey},'%') ESCAPE '/'
and res.AUTHOR like CONCAT('%',#{map.authorKey},'%') ESCAPE '/'
and res.CREATE_USER_ID = #{map.createUserId}
GROUP BY res.RESOURCE_ID order by res.CREATE_TIME desc

select res.RESOURCE_ID resourceId,res.RESOURCE_NAME resourceName,res.AUTHOR author,res.SOURCE_TYPE sourceType, (case when res.LIVING_FLAG = 'Y' then res.LIVING_PATH else res.STORE_PATH end) storePath,res.SIZE size, res.LIVING_FLAG livingFlag, res.THUMB_PATH thumbPath,res.VIEW_CNT viewCnt,res.SUBJECT_ID subjectId,sub.SUBJECT_NAME subjectName,u.REALNAME creatName, GROUP_CONCAT(cl.CLASSLEVEL_NAME ORDER BY cl.SORT ASC SEPARATOR '/') classlevelName, GROUP_CONCAT(cl.CLASSLEVEL_ID ORDER BY cl.SORT ASC SEPARATOR ',') classlevelId from resource res left join user u on res.CREATE_USER_ID = u.USER_ID left join subject sub on res.SUBJECT_ID = sub.SUBJECT_ID JOIN resource_r_classlevel rrc ON res.RESOURCE_ID=rrc.RESOURCE_ID JOIN classlevel cl ON rrc.CLASSLEVEL_ID=cl.CLASSLEVEL_ID where res.RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY res.RESOURCE_ID
mapper.insert: insert into resource (RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_NAME, SUBJECT_ID, AUTHOR, THUMB_PATH, VIEW_CNT, SOURCE_TYPE, STORE_PATH, LIVING_PATH, LIVING_FLAG, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME,SIZE ) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{livingPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{livingFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deleteUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{size} )
mapper.select: select res.RESOURCE_ID resourceId,res.RESOURCE_NAME resourceName,res.AUTHOR author,res.STORE_PATH storePath, res.THUMB_PATH thumbPath,res.VIEW_CNT viewCnt,sub.SUBJECT_NAME subjectName,u.REALNAME creatName, GROUP_CONCAT(cl.CLASSLEVEL_NAME ORDER BY cl.SORT ASC SEPARATOR '/') classlevelName from resource res left join user u on res.CREATE_USER_ID = u.USER_ID left join subject sub on res.SUBJECT_ID = sub.SUBJECT_ID JOIN resource_r_classlevel rrc ON res.RESOURCE_ID=rrc.RESOURCE_ID JOIN classlevel cl ON rrc.CLASSLEVEL_ID=cl.CLASSLEVEL_ID where res.LIVING_FLAG = 'N' and res.DELETE_FLAG='N' GROUP BY res.RESOURCE_ID ORDER BY ( 1 + (case res.subject_id when #{subjectId} THEN 10 ELSE 0 END ) + (case ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(rrc.classlevel_id ORDER BY cls.sort ASC SEPARATOR '/') FROM resource_r_classlevel rrc LEFT JOIN classlevel cls ON rrc.classlevel_id = cls.classlevel_id WHERE rrc.resource_id = res.RESOURCE_ID ) when #{classlevelIds} THEN 20 ELSE 0 END ) ) DESC,res.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 0,6;
mapper.update: update resource set living_path = null where resource_id = #{resourceId}
mapper.select: select resource_id from resource res where res.LIVING_FLAG = 'Y'
mapper.update: update resource set THUMB_PATH = #{thumbPath}, STORE_PATH = #{storePath} ,LIVING_FLAG = #{livingFlag}, size = #{size} where resource_id = #{resourceId}
update resource set VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 where RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId};
